We didn't get into @OrangeDAOxyz. 😞  
But, that's ok!

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT albert
Introducing ⛩️ GaaS - Gating as a Service
Gate your dapp using ANY on-chain data and txns.
1. Create a gate using a contract and an ABI
2. Select Events and Functions
3. Integrate your gate via SDK
4. No need to rely on simple token gating 🫠
Want to try it? Comment below 👇🏻 https://t.co/eATuu1oXUZ

✨ Over the last 48 hours @AnaArsonist & I built WorldName;
An on-chain ENS subname registry that leverages the @worldcoin protocol for sybil-resistance to issue subnames to anyone who is a verified human ✅
Here is a short thread on what this means 🧵 https://t.co/zPno7Iw8qk
